title: [娱乐][CPS]DailyReward——签到?每天每月奖励自定义[1.8-1.15]
author: 玄月月
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Azitate 于 2020-7-24 14:46 编辑 

DailyReward签到,每日每月奖励
功能介绍:
自定义每日每月的任务可配置的gui界面gui内有动态计时领取和不可领取点击按钮会提示声音进入服务器提示papi变量支持
配置文件与使用方法:
配置文件


#
#
#    ____        _ _       ____                            _ 
#   |  _ \  __ _(_) |_   _|  _ \ _____      ____ _ _ __ __| |
#   | | | |/ _` | | | | | | |_) / _ \ \ /\ / / _` | '__/ _` |
#   | |_| | (_| | | | |_| |  _ <  __/\ V  V / (_| | | | (_| |
#   |____/ \__,_|_|_|\__, |_| \_\___| \_/\_/ \__,_|_|  \__,_|
#                    |___/                                   
#                                      by Revivalo
#                        汉化by:玄月（寡姐）
# 插件最初开发为1.13 / 1.14版本，因此可能会遇到声音和物品问题
# 如果有问题请来 https://discord.gg/TfUC8uJ 进行提问
#
#
#                                                          配置文件
#
#
#gui界面内的显示物品
#可领每日奖励显示
reward-item-available: CHEST_MINECART
#每日奖励付费领取显示
reward-item-available-premium: COMMAND_BLOCK_MINECART
#可领每月奖励显示
reward-monthly-item-available: CHEST_MINECART
#不可领每日奖励显示
reward-item-unavailable: MINECART
#不可领取每月奖励显示
monthly-reward-item-unavailable: MINECART
#
# 1.12.x服务器应该在没有minecraft的情况下使用此声音： | https://pastebin.com/gLMhUyis
# 低于1.9请使用以下声音: https://www.planetminecraft.com/blog/all-sound-names---for-playsound/
# 其他: https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/mapping-and-modding-tutorials/2559106-1-9-all-playsound-sound-arguments-sounds-json
#
#奖励不可领提示声音
reward-unavailable-sound: entity_ender_dragon_hurt
#每日奖励付费领取提示声音
reward-premium-collect-sound: block_note_block_pling
#奖励领取声音
reward-collect-sound: entity_player_levelup
#每月奖励被拒绝声音
monthly-reward-denied: block_anvil_destroy
#加入提醒声音
join-reminder-sound: entity_villager_celebrate
#gui界面行数
inventory-rows: 5
#每日奖励领取按钮位置
item-position: 21
#每月奖励领取按钮位置
monthly-item-position: 23
#  (20 ticks = 1 second)
join-notification-delay: 125
#当玩家领取奖励时，他将发送一个公告
collect-message: true
collect-message-premium: true
# 加入并获得奖励时提示
join-message: true
#
#
#                                                         语言配置
#
#
help-message:
 - "&eDailyReward 命令:"
 - "&e /reward - 玩家领取每日奖励"
 - "&e /rewards - 打开gui界面"
 - "&e /reward monthly - 领取每月奖励"
 - "&e /reward premium - 领取付费奖励"
 - "&e /reward reload - 重载插件"
 - "&e /reward reset <player> - 重置玩家的记录"
subtitle-collect-msg: "&a&o你已经收到奖励"
subtitle-collect-premium-msg: "&e&o你已获得高级奖励"
next-reward-time: "&c[DailyReward] 还有: &l%time% &c可以领取下一次奖励"
reload-msg: "&a[DailyReward] 插件已经重载成功"
reward-reset-unknown-player: "&c[DailyReward]玩家%player% 无效"
reward-reset-msg: "&a[DailyReward] 你的签到记录已由 %player%重置"
reward-reset: "&a[DailyReward] 你成功重置 %player%的签到记录"
bad-usage-reset: "&c[DailyReward] 正确使用方法: /reward reset <player>"
avaible-reward-item-display-name: "&a&lDailyReward"
avaible-reward-premium-item-display-name: "&e&lDailyReward &7- &ePremium"
unavailable-reward-item-display-name: "&c&lDailyReward"
avaible-monthly-reward-item-display-name: "&a&lMonthlyReward"
unavailable-monthly-reward-item-displayname: "&c&lMonthlyReward"
inventory-name: "&f&lDailyReward"
unknown-command: "&c[DailyReward] 错误命令，使用 /reward help查看命令"
permission-msg: "&c[DailyReward] 你没有权限"
monthly-reward-cooldown-msg: "&c[DailyReward] 你还有 %days% 天可以领取下一个月的奖励"
permission-msg-monthly: "&c[DailyReward] 你没有权限"
player-collect-monthly-message:
 - "&a&l%player% &a的每月奖励"
available:
 - "&7你可以"
 - "&7领取你的每日奖励"
 - " "
 - "&a点击领取"
available-premium:
 - "&7你付费"
 - "&7可以领取奖励!"
 - " "
 - "&a点击领取"
# %time% 以秒分时做单位，剩余每日时间
not-available:
 - "&c今天不可领取"
 - "&c对不起"
 - " "
 - "&c还剩 %time%"
available-monthly:
 - "&7你可以"
 - "&7领取每月奖励"
 - " "
 - "&a点击领取"
# %days% 以天为单位，剩余每月时间
monthly-not-available:
 - "&c今天不是你领取的时间"
 - "&c对不起"
 - " "
 - "&c可领取时间 %days%"
player-collect-message:
 - "&a&l%player% &a获取了你的奖励"
player-collect-premium-message:
 - "&e&l%player% &e获取了你付费的奖励"
join-msg:
 - " "
 - "&a&oYour Daily Reward is waiting for you - /reward "
 - " "
#
#奖励设置d
#每天奖励
reward-commands:
 - "give %player% diamond 1"
 - "give %player% emerald 1"
 - "say %player% obtain his reward"
#每天付费奖励
reward-premium-commands:
 - "give %player% diamond 5"
 - "give %player% emerald 5"
 - "say %player% obtain his premium reward"
#每月奖励
monthly-reward-commands:
 - "give %player% diamond 10"
 - "say %player% obtain his monthly reward"
#
#gui内的设置
gui-customization:
 vote:
  material: STONE_BUTTON
  display-name: "&e&lVote sites:"
  lore:
   - "&fwww.votesite1.com/#voteid=%player%"
   - "&fEdit this in config.yml"
  position: 31
 player:
  material: PLAYER_HEAD
  display-name: "&a%player%"
  lore:
   - ""
   - "&f&oEdit this in config.yml"
   - ""
  position: 4
复制代码

命令:
/rewards——打开签到gui界面|dailyreward.use
/reward——直接领取每日奖励|dailyreward.use
/reward monthly——直接领取每月奖励|dailyreward.monthly
/reward premium——领取高级每日奖励|dailyreward.premium
/reward reset <player>——重置签到记录|dailyreward.manage
/reward reload——重载插件|dailyreward.manage
/reward help——查看指令帮助|dailyreward.use下载与授权:
